sentences.english: But others consider Mr. Welch out of touch.
sentences.chinese: 不过，其他人认为韦尔奇说的不靠谱。

sentences.english: The light-converting efficiency has been researched with photocurrent measurements.
sentences.chinese: 光生电流谱研究了薄膜的光电转换效率。

sentences.english: But the family tree doesn’t stop there.
sentences.chinese: 但是家族谱并不会止于此。

sentences.english: An opera is a play set to music.
The structures of both are characterized by FT-TR and 1H-NMR.
sentences.chinese: 借助红外光谱和1H核磁共振谱图分析了产物的结构。

sentences.english: AC impedance spectroscopy technique was applied to study the conductivity and its temperature dependance.
sentences.chinese: 以交流阻抗谱技术测定了电导率及其与温度的关系。

sentences.english: Navy, there are 2310 ships, also calculate to depend a chart.
sentences.chinese: 海军，有二三十条军舰吧，还算靠谱。

sentences.english: All right, so we can, in fact, observe individual lines.
sentences.chinese: 好的，事实上我们可以看单个的谱线。

sentences.english: Conclusion Changes of drug resistance has occurred to the bacteria isolated from in-use disinfectants in school medical rooms.
sentences.chinese: 结论消毒剂在使用过程中污染菌的耐药谱发生了改变。

sentences.english: The nullity of a graph is the multiplicity of the eigenvalue zero in its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 图的零度是指在图的谱中特征值0的重数。

sentences.english: VI is salient which has 4 unique allozyme bands.
sentences.chinese: 种群VI表现最突出，共有4条特有谱带。

sentences.english: The second, analyze the PDOS, we gain frequency of the breathing mode.
sentences.chinese: 第二，分析声子的振动谱，我们就得到了喘振频率。

sentences.english: The effects of several factors on the gain spectrum of a Raman fiber amplifier (RFA) are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了影响拉曼光纤放大器增益谱的几个因素。

sentences.english: Results The structure of the target molecule was identified by 1H NMR, 13C NMR and element analysis.
sentences.chinese: 结果最终产物由核磁共振谱和元素分析进行结构鉴定。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the gain spectra have been restrained by Gaussian apodization function.
sentences.chinese: 并且，增益谱都受到高斯变迹函数的制约。

to notate music/to write a score
music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
(music) fingering/(TCM) manipulation of acupuncture needles/(keyboard) typing technique/(dance) hand movements/(painting) finger method
xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
traditional Chinese musical notation using Chinese characters to represent musical notes
to have a plan/to know what one is doing
